Chapter 34, Part 19: Difficult to Believe and Understand
Furthermore, SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, form is pure, and because form is pure, the cognition of all kinds is pure.
Why is it so?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of form, and the purity of the cognition of all kinds are non-dual, undivided, not separate, and uninterrupted.

Because the recipient is pure, feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness are pure, and because feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness are pure, the cognition of all kinds is pure.
Why is it so?

Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness, and the purity of the cognition of all kinds are non-dual, undivided, not separate, and uninterrupted.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the eye sense base is pure, and because the eye sense base is pure, the cognition of all kinds is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the eye sense field is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
Because the one who receives is pure, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, and the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, therefore omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the one who receives is pure, the form sense field is pure, and omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the form sense field is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.

The purity of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields is due to the purity of the recipient. The purity of the recipient is due to the purity of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient and the purity of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are non-dual, have no divisions, and are not separate.
SubhÅ«ti!
The purity of the eye sense field is due to the purity of the recipient. The purity of the recipient is due to the purity of the eye sense field.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient and the purity of the eye sense field are non-dual, have no divisions, and are not separate.

because the recipient is pure, the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact, and the various feelings produced by eye contact as a condition are pure; because the form element up to eye contact as a condition are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, and the form element up to eye contact as a condition are pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the ear element is pure, and because the ear element is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, and the ear element is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.

because the recipient is pure, the sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact, and the various feelings that arise from ear contact as a condition are pure, and because the sound element up to the various feelings that arise from ear contact as a condition are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
If the recipient is pure, the sound element up to the various feelings that arise from ear contact as a condition are pure, and if omniscience is pure, they are non-dual and not divided.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the nose element is pure, and because the nose element is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
If the recipient is pure, the nose element is pure, and if omniscience is pure, they are non-dual and not divided.

because the recipient is pure, the nose-consciousness element and the nose-contact and the nose-contact as a condition for the production of feelings are pure, and because the nose-consciousness element, nose-contact, and nose-contact as a condition for the production of feelings are pure, all-knowledge is pure.
Why is that?

Because the recipient is pure, and the nose-consciousness element, nose-contact, and nose-contact as a condition for the production of feelings are pure, and all-knowledge is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no discrimination.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the tongue element is pure, and because the tongue element is pure, all-knowledge is pure.
Why is that?
Because the recipient is pure, and the tongue element is pure, and all-knowledge is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no discrimination.

because the recipient is pure, the flavor element, tongue consciousness element, and tongue contact, and the feelings produced from the condition of tongue contact are pure; because the flavor element, up to the feelings produced from the condition of tongue contact are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?

If the recipient is pure, the flavor element, up to the feelings produced from the condition of tongue contact are pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the body element is pure, and because the body element is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, the body element is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.

because the recipient is pure, the sphere of touch, the body consciousness, and the bodily contact and the feelings produced from the condition of bodily contact are pure; because the sphere of touch, the body consciousness, and the bodily contact and the feelings produced from the condition of bodily contact are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?

If the recipient is pure, the sphere of touch, the body consciousness, and the bodily contact and the feelings produced from the condition of bodily contact are pure, and if omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the mind-sphere is pure, and because the mind-sphere is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, the mind-sphere is pure, and if omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.

because the recipient is pure, the dharma realm, the mind consciousness realm, and the mental contact and the mental contact that arises from the conditions of the mental contact are pure. The mental contact that arises from the conditions of the mental contact is pure, therefore the omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?

If the recipient is pure, if the dharma realm, up to the mental contact and the mental contact that arises from the conditions of the mental contact are pure, if the omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the earth element is pure, and the earth element is pure, therefore the omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the recipient is pure, if the earth element is pure, if the omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
Because the recipient is pure, the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are pure, and because the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient and the purity of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are non-dual, without distinction or interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, ignorance is pure, and because ignorance is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of ignorance, and the purity of omniscience are non-dual, without distinction or interruption.

because the recipient is pure, the practice, consciousness, name and form, six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, depression, and anguish are pure, and because old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, depression, and anguish are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?

Because the recipient is pure, and old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, depression, and anguish are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the perfection of generosity is pure, and because the perfection of generosity is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the recipient is pure, and the perfection of generosity is pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
Because the recipient is pure, the precepts, patience, vigor, concentration, and wisdom are pure. Because the precepts up to wisdom are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, and the precepts up to wisdom are pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, inner emptiness is pure, and inner emptiness is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, and inner emptiness is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.

because the recipient is pure, external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-abandonment, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature of non-existence, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of non-existence are pure, and because external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of non-existence is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is this?

If the recipient is pure, if external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of non-existence is pure, and if the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, suchness is pure, and because suchness is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, suchness is pure, and if suchness is pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.

Because the recipient is pure, the dharma element, dharma nature, non-false nature, invariable nature, true reality, true reality-limit, space element, and inconceivable element are pure. Because the dharma element, etc. are pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is this?ğŸ”½If the recipient is pure, the dharma element, etc. are pure, and if the dharma element, etc. are pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Because this is a compounded purity.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the noble truth of suffering is pure, and because the noble truth of suffering is pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is this?
If the one who receives is pure, the noble truth of suffering is pure, and omniscience is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no discontinuity.

The one who receives is pure, therefore the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are pure, and the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are pure, therefore omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who receives is pure, the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are pure, and omniscience is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no discontinuity.
SubhÅ«ti!
The one who receives is pure, therefore the four meditations are pure, and the four meditations are pure, therefore omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the four meditations are pure, and omniscience is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no discontinuity.
because the recipient is pure, the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are pure, and because the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
Because the recipient is pure, the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the eight liberations are pure, and because the eight liberations are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
Because the recipient is pure, the eight liberations are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.

Because the recipient is pure, the eight perfect penetrations, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases are pure, and because the eight perfect penetrations, nine sequential concentrations, and ten universal bases are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?

If the one who receives is pure, the eight liberations, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases are pure, and if the cognition of the all-knowing is pure, there is no duality, no division, no discrimination, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the one who receives is pure, the four establishments of mindfulness are pure, and if the four establishments of mindfulness are pure, the cognition of the all-knowing is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who receives is pure, the four establishments of mindfulness are pure, and if the cognition of the all-knowing is pure, there is no duality, no division, no discrimination, and no interruption.

If the one who receives is pure, the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path are pure, and if the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path are pure, the cognition of the all-knowing is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who receives is pure, the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path are pure, and omniscience is pure. Because in this way, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no cutting off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the one who receives is pure, the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, and the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
Because if the one who receives is pure, the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no cutting off.
Because the one who receives is pure, the signless and wishless gates of liberation are pure, and the signless and wishless gates of liberation are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
Because if the one who receives is pure, the signless and wishless gates of liberation are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no cutting off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the ten grounds of the bodhisattva are pure, and because the ten grounds of the bodhisattva are pure, the wisdom of omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the ten grounds of the bodhisattva, and the purity of the wisdom of omniscience, are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the five eyes are pure, and because the five eyes are pure, the wisdom of omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the five eyes, and the purity of the wisdom of omniscience, are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
Because the recipient is pure, the six supernormal powers are pure, and because the six supernormal powers are pure, the wisdom of omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who receives is pure, the six supernormal knowledges are pure, and if the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure, there is no duality, no division, no discrimination, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the one who receives is pure, the ten powers of a Buddha are pure, and if the ten powers of a Buddha are pure, the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who receives is pure, the ten powers of a Buddha are pure, and if the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure, there is no duality, no division, no discrimination, and no interruption.

If the one who receives is pure, the four grounds of self-confidence, the four analytical knowledges, great loving kindness, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive qualities of a Buddha are pure, and if the four grounds of self-confidence up to the eighteen distinctive qualities of a Buddha are pure, the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha are pure, and the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?ğŸ”½Because the one who receives is pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.ğŸ”½SubhÅ«ti!
Because the one who receives is pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?ğŸ”½Because the one who receives is pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the purity of the recipient is the purity of the knowledge of all modes, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the knowledge of all modes, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are all without duality, not two.

Because the purity of the recipient is the purity of the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of all aspects, and the purity of the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of all aspects, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are all without duality, not two.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the purity of the recipient is the purity of all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways, and the purity of all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.
Why is this?
If the one who receives is pure, the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are pure, and omniscience is pure. Because there is no duality, no division into two, no distinction, and no discontinuity.
The one who receives is pure, therefore all samÄdhi gateways are pure, and all samÄdhi gateways are pure, therefore omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, all samÄdhi gateways are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division into two, no distinction, and no discontinuity.
SubhÅ«ti!
The one who receives is pure, therefore the fruit of entering the stream is pure, and the fruit of entering the stream is pure, therefore omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the one who receives is pure, the fruit of entering the stream is pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division into two, no distinction, and no discontinuity.

because the recipient is pure, the fruits of once-returning, non-returning, and arhatship are pure, and because the fruits of once-returning, non-returning, and arhatship are pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is this?

If the recipient is pure, the fruits of once-returning, non-returning, and arhatship are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual and not divided, are not discriminated and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the recipient is pure, the pratyekabuddha's enlightenment is pure, and because the pratyekabuddha's enlightenment is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is this?
If the recipient is pure, the pratyekabuddha's enlightenment is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual and not divided, are not discriminated and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the recipient is pure, the practice of all bodhisattva mahÄsattvas is pure, and because the practice of all bodhisattva mahÄsattvas is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the practice of all bodhisattva mahÄsattvas, and the purity of omniscience, are without duality, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the recipient is pure, the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas is pure, and because the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?

Because the purity of the recipient, the purity of the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas, and the purity of omniscience, are without duality, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
Furthermore, SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, form is pure, and because form is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, form is pure, and the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.

The knower is pure, therefore feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are pure, and feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are pure, therefore the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?

If the knower is pure, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are pure, and the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
The knower is pure, therefore the eye sense base is pure, and the eye sense base is pure, therefore the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the eye sense base is pure, and the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
because the knower is pure, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, and because the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the knower is pure, and the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are pure, and omniscience is pure. The two are not two, not divided, not broken apart.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, the form sense field is pure, and because the form sense field is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the knower is pure, and the form sense field is pure, and omniscience is pure. The two are not two, not divided, not broken apart.
Because the knower is pure, the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma sense fields are pure, and because the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma sense fields are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the knower is pure, the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects are pure, and omniscience is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the knower is pure, the eye element is pure, and omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the eye element is pure, and omniscience is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.

If the knower is pure, the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact and the various feelings produced by eye contact are pure, and the form element up to eye contact and the various feelings produced by eye contact are pure, and omniscience is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, if the form realm up to the tactile objects arisen from the condition of eye-contact are pure, and if the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual and not divided.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the knower is pure, the ear-base is pure, and the ear-base is pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, if the ear-base is pure, and if the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual and not divided.

If the knower is pure, the sound-base, ear-consciousness-base, and ear-contact, and the tactile objects arisen from the condition of ear-contact are pure, and the sound-base up to the tactile objects arisen from the condition of ear-contact are pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?
Because of non-duality, non-division, non-distinction, and non-discontinuity.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the knower is pure, the nose element is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is that?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the nose element is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Because of non-duality, non-division, non-distinction, and non-discontinuity.

If the knower is pure, the smell element, nose consciousness element, and nose contact and the various feelings that arise from nose contact as a condition are pure, and the various feelings that arise from nose contact as a condition are pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is that?

If the one who knows is pure, if the olfactory sphere up to nose contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings is pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not broken apart.
If the knower is pure, the nose consciousness element is pure, and if the nose consciousness element is pure, the knower is pure.
Why is that?

Because the purity of the knower and the purity of the nose consciousness element are not two, nor are they divided into two groups, nor are they discriminated as separate, nor are they cut off.ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the body element is pure, and if the body element is pure, the knower is pure.ğŸ”½Why is that?ğŸ”½Because the purity of the knower and the purity of the body element are not two, nor are they divided into two groups, nor are they discriminated as separate, nor are they cut off.
If the knower is pure, the body consciousness element is pure, and if the body consciousness element is pure, the knower is pure.

Why is that?ğŸ”½Because the purity of the knower and the purity of the body consciousness element are not two, nor are they divided into two groups, nor are they discriminated as separate, nor are they cut off.

If the knower is pure, the flavor element up to the tongue contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings are pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, there is no two, no two parts, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the knower is pure, the body element is pure, and if the body element is pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the body element is pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, there is no two, no two parts, no distinction, and no interruption.

If the knower is pure, the touch element, the body consciousness element, and the body contact, and the various feelings arisen from the condition of body contact are pure, and if the touch element up to the various feelings arisen from the condition of body contact are pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?

If the one who knows is pure, the body sense field, the body contact, and the feelings produced from body contact as a condition are pure. If the cognition of the knowledge of all modes is pure, they are pure. There is no twofoldness or division here, no differentiation or exclusion.ğŸ”½SubhÅ«ti!ğŸ”½
If the knower is pure, the body sense-sphere and the tactile objects are pure, and if the tactile objects are pure, all-knowledge is pure.

Why is it so?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the body sense-sphere and the tactile objects are pure, and if the tactile objects are pure, all-knowledge is pure.ğŸ”½Because in the past the knower was not pure, the body sense-sphere and the tactile objects were not pure, and because in the past the tactile objects were not pure, all-knowledge was not pure.
If the knower is pure, the mind sense-sphere and mental objects are pure, and if mental objects are pure, all-knowledge is pure.

Why is it so?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the mind sense-sphere and mental objects are pure, and if mental objects are pure, all-knowledge is pure.ğŸ”½Because in the past the knower was not pure, the mind sense-sphere and mental objects were not pure, and because in the past mental objects were not pure, all-knowledge was not pure.
If the knower is pure, and if the dharma realm up to mental contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings are pure, then omniscience is pure.

Why is that?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, and if the dharma realm up to mental contact as a condition for the arising of various feelings are pure, then omniscience is pure. Because in this way, there is no duality.
If the knower is pure, then the earth element is pure. The earth element being pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
If the knower is pure, and if the earth element is pure, then omniscience is pure. Because in this way, there is no duality.
If the knower is pure, then the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are pure. The water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements being pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
If the knower is pure, and if the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are pure, then omniscience is pure. Because in this way, there is no duality.
SubhÅ«ti!
The purity of the knower is the purity of ignorance, and the purity of ignorance is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of ignorance, and the purity of omniscience are not two, are not divided, are not different, and are not cut off.

The purity of the knower is the purity of volitional actions, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress, and the purity of volitional actions up to old age and death and sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?

Because the purity of the knower, the purity of volitional actions up to old age and death and sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress, and the purity of omniscience are not two, are not divided, are not different, and are not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the purity of the knower is the purity of the perfection of giving, and the purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the perfection of giving, and the purity of omniscience are one in essence; they are indivisible, not separate, and uncuttable.
Because the purity of the knower is the purity of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom, and the purity of morality up to wisdom is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of morality up to wisdom, and the purity of omniscience are one in essence; they are indivisible, not separate, and uncuttable.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the purity of the knower is the purity of inner emptiness, and the purity of inner emptiness is the purity of omniscience.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, inner emptiness is pure, and the knowledge of all modes is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.

Because the knower is pure, external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-abandonment, emptiness of essential nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature of non-existence, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of intrinsic nature are pure, and because external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of intrinsic nature is pure, the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?

If the knower is pure, external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of intrinsic nature is pure, and the knowledge of all modes is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the knower is pure, thusness is pure; because thusness is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of thusness, and the purity of omniscience are not two, not divided, not different, and not cut off.

Because the knower is pure, the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, birthlessness nature, dharma determination, dharma abiding, reality limit, space realm, and inconceivable realm are pure; because the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm, and the purity of omniscience are not two, not divided, not different, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
because the knower is pure, the noble truth of suffering is pure, and because the noble truth of suffering is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
Because the knower is pure, the noble truth of suffering is pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
Because the knower is pure, the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path are pure, and because the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
Because the knower is pure, the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path are pure, and omniscience is pure, there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, the four concentrations are pure, and because the four concentrations are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is that?
If the knower is pure, the four formless concentrations are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because the knower is pure, the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
If the knower is pure, the eight liberations are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?ğŸ”½If the knower is pure, the eight liberations are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because there is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.

because the purity of the knower is the purity of the eight liberations, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases, and the purity of the eight liberations, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower and the purity of the eight liberations, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases are non-dual and not divided.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the purity of the knower is the purity of the four establishments of mindfulness, and the purity of the four establishments of mindfulness is the purity of omniscience.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower and the purity of the four establishments of mindfulness are non-dual and not divided.

because the knower is pure, the four right efforts, four legs of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are pure, and because the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path are pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the knower is pure, the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path are pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, and the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, omniscience is pure.
Why is this?
If the knower is pure, the emptiness gate of liberation is pure, and omniscience is pure, they are non-dual, not divided, not separate, and not cut off.

because the knowledge of the knower is pure, the doors of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness are pure, and because the doors of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness are pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?

If the knowledge of the knower is pure, and the doors of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knowledge of the knower is pure, the ten grounds of the bodhisattvas are pure, and because the ten grounds of the bodhisattvas are pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?

If the knowledge of the knower is pure, and the ten grounds of the bodhisattvas are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, they are non-dual, not divided into two, not separate, and not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knowledge of the knower is pure, the five eyes are pure, and because the five eyes are pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the five eyes are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, there is no duality and no division.
The knower is pure, therefore the six supernormal knowledges are pure, and the six supernormal knowledges are pure, therefore the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the six supernormal knowledges are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, there is no duality and no division.
SubhÅ«ti!
The knower is pure, therefore the ten powers of a buddha are pure, and the ten powers of a buddha are pure, therefore the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the ten powers of a buddha are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure, there is no duality and no division.

because the purity of the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha is due to the purity of the knower, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes is due to the purity of the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha.
Why is it so?

If the knower is pure, the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha are pure, and the knowledge of all modes is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, the power of non-forgetting is pure, and the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, the power of non-forgetting is pure, and the knowledge of all modes is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.
because the purity of the knower is the purity of the nature of constant relinquishment, and the purity of the nature of constant relinquishment is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the nature of constant relinquishment, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes, are without duality and not divided.
Subhuti!
Because the purity of the knower is the purity of the knowledge of all modes, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.
Why is this?
Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the knowledge of all modes, and the purity of the knowledge of all modes, are without duality and not divided.

Because the purity of the knower is the purity of the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of all aspects, and the purity of the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the knowledge of all modes.
Why is this?
Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of inherent nature is pure, and the emptiness of inherent nature is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of essential nature is pure, and the emptiness of essential nature is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of all conditioned phenomena is pure, and the emptiness of all conditioned phenomena is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.ğŸ”½Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of all conditioned and unconditioned phenomena is pure, and the emptiness of all conditioned and unconditioned phenomena is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.ğŸ”½Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.
Because of the purity of the knower, the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the emptiness of all phenomena is pure, and the cognition of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

Because the knower is pure, the fruit of stream-entry is pure, and because the fruit of stream-entry is pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?

Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the fruit of stream-entry, and the purity of the cognition of the all-knowing one are without duality, have no divisions, are not separate, and are not cut off.

Because the knower is pure, the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat are pure, and because the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat are pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?

Because the purity of the knower, the purity of the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat, and the purity of the cognition of the all-knowing one are without duality, have no divisions, are not separate, and are not cut off.
SubhÅ«ti!
Because the knower is pure, the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddha is pure, and because the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddha is pure, the cognition of the all-knowing one is pure.
Why is it so?
If the knower is pure, and if pratyekabuddha enlightenment is pure, then all-knowledge is pure.
Why is that?
SubhÅ«ti, if the knower is pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, then all-knowledge is pure.
Why is that?
SubhÅ«ti, if the knower is pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, then the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is that?
SubhÅ«ti, if the knower is pure, and if the knowledge of all modes is pure, then the knowledge of all modes is pure.
Why is that?

If the one who knows is pure, and if the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas is pure, then the cognition of all kinds is pure. There is no duality, no division, no distinction, and no interruption.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
